backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining resume content, skills, visitor messages, recruiter visits, and user profiles with access‑controlled operations and public logging/query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing feature requirements, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for two authorization-related Content Editor features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files, covering app structure, resume data, owner panel components, and supporting hooks/utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style file defining global OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and default border/background styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app into a root div with main.tsx as the entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that gates access behind a recruiter prompt, loads backend content and skills, renders all resume sections, and provides owner panel access.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Certi: Editor component for adding, updating, expanding, and deleting certification entries within the owner content management panel.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Conte: Main owner content editor that loads content and skills, manages local drafts, and saves updates including skill additions/removals.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Educa: UI component for adding, editing, expanding, and deleting education entries with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Exper: Editor for managing experience items, including add, edit, expand, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Hobbi: Simple list editor for adding and deleting hobbies with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Owner: Owner authentication panel that unlocks access to recruiter visits, messages, and the content editor.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Proje: Editor for managing project entries, allowing creation, expansion, editing, and deletion of projects.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Recru: Displays recruiter visit logs, handles loading/error states, and allows clearing all visits with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Skill: Provides UI to add, edit, and delete skills with inline editing and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Visit: Shows visitor messages sorted by newest first and supports clearing all messages with confirmation.
Renders a list of projects with expandable details and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/RecruiterPromptM: Modal prompting visitors to identify as recruiters and optionally log their company name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Generic animated section wrapper that reveals content on scroll using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar that highlights the active section and enables smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/VisitorMessageFo: A React form component that submits visitor messages using a mutation hook and displays a success state after submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides a query that checks whether the current caller has admin privileges using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useContent.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating content via the backend, with automatic cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains query and mutation hooks for secret messages (stubbed), and CRUD operations for skills using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecruiterVisit.ts: Hooks for logging, retrieving, and clearing recruiter visit records with backend mutations and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorMessages.ts: Hooks for submitting, fetching, and clearing visitor messages using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining base styles, color tokens, and custom utility classes for the UI theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/resumeContent.ts: Static data object containing resume information such as hero, education, experience, skills, and certifications.
frontend/src/utils/ownerAccess.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/ownerPanelAccess.ts: Exports a hardcoded owner panel password constant.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the resume website.
